stripped_text: During runs on this server, the Runner must pay 1 credit as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines. Limit 1 region per server.
text: During runs on this server, the Runner must pay 1[credit] as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Midway Station Grid
